seo.title: The Old Volt - Electric Tattoo Artistry & Custom Designs
seo.description: Premium tattoo studio specializing in electric artistry & custom designs. Book your consultation at The Old Volt today. Professional, clean, award-winning.

openGraph.title: The Old Volt - Electric Tattoo Artistry
openGraph.description: Where electric artistry meets timeless craft. Premium custom tattoos by award-winning artists.

headline: Where Electric Artistry
Meets Timeless Craft
hero.subheadline: Award-winning custom tattoos that spark conversation and ignite passion. Every piece tells a story worth remembering.
hero.imageAlt: The Old Volt tattoo studio interior with vintage industrial decor

portfolio.subtitle: Every piece is a unique fusion of classic technique and modern innovation

sessions.subtitle: Choose your journey from consultation to masterpiece

testimonials.quote: Marcus transformed my vision into something beyond my wildest dreams. The attention to detail and electric energy at The Old Volt is unmatched.
testimonials.author: Sarah Mitchell

testimonials.quote: Three years later and my tattoo still gets compliments daily. The Old Volt doesn't just do tattoos, they create wearable art that tells stories.
testimonials.author: James Crawford

paragraphs: Marcus Sterling has been pushing the boundaries of tattoo artistry for over twelve years. What started as a fascination with the intersection of electricity and art has evolved into a signature style that combines industrial aesthetics with organic flow.

At The Old Volt, every tattoo is approached as a collaborative masterpiece. Marcus believes that the best tattoos happen when technical skill meets genuine connection, creating pieces that resonate on both visual and emotional levels.
about.callout: Every line tells a story, every shade carries meaning.
about.imageAlt: Marcus Sterling, lead artist at The Old Volt tattoo studio

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We recommend booking 3-4 weeks in advance for full sessions. Consultations can often be scheduled within the week. Our books fill quickly, especially for larger custom pieces.

items.question: What's included in the consultation?
items.answer: Your consultation includes custom design creation, placement discussion, size recommendations, and a detailed timeline for your tattoo. The £150 consultation fee is applied toward your final tattoo cost.

finalCta.headline: Ready to Create Your Masterpiece?
finalCta.subheadline: Join the hundreds who've trusted The Old Volt with their story. Limited availability.

booking.modalDescription: Tell us about your tattoo vision and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to schedule your consultation.
booking.successMessage: We'll contact you within 24 hours to confirm your consultation. Check your email for next steps.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit will be required to secure your appointment
